item.title: Why I don't like the Ruby community
item.description: I write Python and Javascript code. I use Django and jQuery. And I cringe every time I have to run gem install x. I only have a limited understanding of Ruby and hardly any of Ruby on Rails. It seems disorganized to me and hard to process. All this is fine – I don’t have to use any of it if I don’t like it, right? I always knew there was something wrong with the way Ruby works.
